author: dlr
msg: Add a "sparse_checkout" flag to the svn_wc_revision_status_t
structure, and expose it as new "P" output from the 'svnversion'
command (e.g. "37P" means a partial checkout of r37).
(help): Include documentation for the new "P" (sParse checkout) output.
(main): Append "P" to the outout when the sparse_checkout field of
represents a WC summary, rather than solely the mix of revisions
found in the WC (meaning that it's now somewhat mis-named).  Add a
(svnversion_test): Include test for the "sParse checkout" output.

author: cmpilato
msg: On the 'better-two-url-merges' branch, merge oustanding changes from trunk.

author: cmpilato
msg: On the 'better-two-url-merges' branch, permit merges between cousin
merge sources by unmerging the diffs between the left side and the
common ancestor of the two sources, and then merging the diffs between
the common ancestor and the right side.
merge sources, with merge tracking to boot.
